20101209023445.000|20101209023447.000|CCO|THE PRESIDENTIAL ELECTION TEN 
20101209023447.000|20101209023449.000|CCO|DAYS AGO WERE ANNOUNCED.
20101209023449.000|20101209023451.000|CCO|PROTESTORS BURNED TIRES, SET UP 
20101209023451.000|20101209023453.000|CCO|ROADBLOCKS AND TORCHED VEHICLES.
20101209023453.000|20101209023455.000|CCO|MOST OF THE RAGE COMES FROM 
20101209023455.000|20101209023457.000|CCO|SUPPORTERS OF THE PRESIDENTIAL 
20101209023457.000|20101209023459.000|CCO|HOPEFUL MICHELLE MARTALESE.

20101209023605.286|20101209023606.714|CCO|WORSENING.

20101209023612.667|20101209023614.333|CCO|DISEASE IN OCTOBER.
